name: three-meet
description: A low-fantasy Pathfinder hack for dark times
author: R.G. Wood <ric@grislyeye.com> (https://grislyeye.com)

scripts.test: stylelint main.css assets/styles/**/*.css && npx linkinator index.html -ro --recurse --skip '(.*\.reddit\.com)|(.*\.twitter\.com)|(.*\.drivethrurpg\.com)' --verbosity debug
